title: Hummy's Hunger

how_to_play: Move Hummy with the arrow keys
Press spacebar, while stopped, to eat things
You can only eat things smaller than you
Jumping on things make them shrink

description: Tiny platformer. Feed the tiny creature so it may grow bigger.
The point was to make the creature grow so big that the world would be comparatively tiny and the creature would be able to eat it... But time got in the way.
